content:
It seems links to slides never made it to the schedule.

Could someone give me access / tell me where to send a PR, and I'll take care of this?
Each author was sent a link to edit their talk page. Some added links to their slides or to a paper. You can add your slides there if you wish
It's a pity we can't do a global update. :-(
Do we have a unified place with all the links? If not, I can go through each of the discussion threads later.

• Johan Commelin - The Mathlib Initiative: slides, video
  • Vasilii Nesterov - Verified computation of real asymptotics: slides, video
  • Fabrizio Montesi - CSLib: The Lean Computer Science Library: slides, video
  • Sebastian Ullrich - The Lean module system: slides, video
  • Stefan Kebekus - Project VD: slides, video
  • Leo de Moura - The State of Lean: slides, video
  • Sophie Morel - Nori's construction in Lean: slides, video
  • Alex Kontorovich - Teaching Real Analysis as a Video Game: slides, video
  • Chris Henson - Proof Automation and Metaprogramming in CSLib: slides, video
  • Floris van Doorn - Lessons from the Carleson project: slides, video
  • Michal Mrugala - Formalizing Class Field Theory: slides, video
  • Kim Morrison - grind: slides, video
  • Joël Riou - Formalization of homotopy theory in Lean: slides, video
  • Etienne Marion - Ionescu-Tulcea theorem in Mathlib: slides, video
  • Julius Marx - MRiscX: slides, video
  • Oliver Dressler - lean-lsp-mcp: slides, video
updated on research seminars (and hence also the website).
